<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>Get all global data sources</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"get"} path={"/perses-public/api/v1/globaldatasources"}></MethodEndpoint>



Retrieves a list of all global data sources.


## Request

<div><div><ApiTabs label={undefined} id={undefined}><TabItem label={"200"} value={"200"}><div>

List of global data sources

</div><div><MimeTabs className={"openapi-tabs__mime"} schemaType={"response"}><TabItem label={"application/json"} value={"application/json"}><SchemaTabs className={"openapi-tabs__schema"}><TabItem label={"Schema"} value={"Schema"}><details style={{}} className={"openapi-markdown__details response"} data-collapsed={false} open={true}><summary style={{}} className={"openapi-markdown__details-summary-response"}><strong>Schema</strong></summary><div style={{"textAlign":"left","marginLeft":"1rem"}}></div><ul style={{"marginLeft":"1rem"}}><li><div style={{"fontSize":"var(--ifm-code-font-size)","opacity":"0.6","marginLeft":"-.5rem","paddingBottom":".5rem"}}>Array [</div></li><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"uid"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"string","example":"datasource-1"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"name"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"string","example":"Prometheus"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"type"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"string","example":"prometheus"}}></SchemaItem><li><div style={{"fontSize":"var(--ifm-code-font-size)","opacity":"0.6","marginLeft":"-.5rem"}}>]</div></li></ul></details></TabItem><TabItem label={"Example (from schema)"} value={"Example (from schema)"}><ResponseSamples responseExample={"[\n  {\n    \"uid\": \"datasource-1\",\n    \"name\": \"Prometheus\",\n    \"type\": \"prometheus\"\n  }\n]"} language={"json"}></ResponseSamples></TabItem></SchemaTabs></TabItem></MimeTabs></div></TabItem></ApiTabs></div></div>
